message: why do people say that fortnite is toxic, there literally isnt any proximity chat or ingame text chat or any of that, league of legends is 100x more toxic generally
reason: The message is a comparison between two games, Fortnite and League of Legends, and their respective communities. The user is expressing their opinion on the perceived toxicity of these communities. There is no use of offensive language, derogatory comments, or disrespectful behavior in the message.
label: toxic
